sentence.Network_en: The bags have adjustable shoulder straps.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些包的肩带可以调整。

sentence.Network_en: The height of the bicycle seat is adjustable.
sentence.Network_cn: 这辆自行车车座的高度可以调节。

sentence.Network_en: More expensive cameras have adjustable focusing.
sentence.Network_cn: 比较贵的照相机有可调焦距.

entry.def: If something is adjustable, it can be changed to different positions or sizes.

example.ex: The bags have adjustable shoulder straps...
example.tran: 这些包的肩带可以调整。

means.word_mean: 1. capable of being changed so as to match or fit;

auth_sentence.content: This thing has load-compensating, ride-height adjustable air suspension.
auth_sentence.res_content: This thing has load-compensating, ride-height adjustable air suspension.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This thing has load-compensating, ride-height adjustable air suspension.

auth_sentence.content: They have scratchproof lenses and an adjustable band.
auth_sentence.res_content: They have scratchproof lenses and an adjustable band.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They have scratchproof lenses and an adjustable band.

auth_sentence.content: Suspended light box provides soft, adjustable light.
auth_sentence.res_content: Suspended light box provides soft, adjustable light.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Suspended light box provides soft, adjustable light.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"可以……的,能……的"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上icalbe.

stems_affixes.word_buile: love爱+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可爱的,惹人爱的
accept接受,承认+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可接受的,合意的
adjust调整+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可调整的
break破坏+able可以……的,能……的→adj.会破的,易碎的
change改变+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可改变的
conceive构思,以为+able形容词结尾→adj.可想象的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得做的;合意的,称心的;期望得到的
stems_affixes.word_buile: desire想望,期望+able可以……的,能……的→adj.值得做的;合意的,称心的;期望得到的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 赞成的,有利的,赞许的,良好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: favor好感,宠爱+able可以……的,能……的→adj.赞成的,有利的,赞许的,良好的
im不+pregn攻击+able可以……的,能……的→adj.攻不破的,征服不了的
inflame使燃烧+able可以……的,能……的→inflammable可燃烧的,可激怒的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不可侵犯的,不可亵渎的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+viol违反,冒犯+able可以……的,能……的→adj.不可侵犯的,不可亵渎的
know知道+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可知的
obtain获得,得到+able可以……的,能……的→adj.能得到的,可到手的
predict预言+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可预言的
prefer更喜欢,宁愿+able可以……的,能……的→adj.更可取的,更好的
tract拉+able可以……的,能……的→能够拉[回来]→易管的

sentences.en: An adjustable spanner should do the job.
sentences.cn: 拿一把活动扳手来应该管用。

sentences.en: More expensive cameras have adjustable focusing.
sentences.cn: 比较贵的照相机有可调焦距。
